name: The Collection (LoonyGoober)
description:
A Mini-Game Collection testing how great you can be, asking you to complete it's challenges to the best of your ability, and hopefully you discover what greatness truly is.  It offers both some simple but fun games with a narrative that drives the existential question of greatness and value straight into the gameplay. It offers some songs from HOME's 2017 album "Resting State" as a complimentary soundtrack, hoping to better set the tone for the Collection.

Utilize Mouse and Keyboard - Mouse will be used to click and/or drag when prompted, A and D keys will be used to click and move when prompted.
